title: Preface
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: Your first R Markdown document
text:
You need certain R packages for using R Markdown and also for carrying out this tutorial. The following instructions will help to get you set up and ready to go.


Open RStudio and copy-paste the lines below into the console and press Enter:

 markdown_practice <- c(   
     "rmarkdown",   
     "tinytex",   
     "tidyverse",   
     "knitr",   
     "remotes",   
     "gapminder",   
     "shiny",   
     "flexdashboard",   
     "here")
 install.packages(markdown_practice)

title: Your first R Markdown document
text:
Open RStudio and copy-paste the lines below into the console and press Enter:

 markdown_practice <- c(   
     "rmarkdown",   
     "tinytex",   
     "tidyverse",   
     "knitr",   
     "remotes",   
     "gapminder",   
     "shiny",   
     "flexdashboard",   
     "here")
 install.packages(markdown_practice)

title: Introduction
text:
Introduction
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See @knuth84 for additional discussion of literate programming.
